title: FS:  7 card lot - SC.350.30 - possibly cut from same sheet - $old
author: t206fix

posts.post_title: FS:  7 card lot - SC.350.30 - possibly cut from same sheet - $old
posts.post_content:
7 card lot - "probably" cut from the same sheet, although I have no definitive proof, however:

-They are all measure, or slightly oversized. 
-Purchased for someone who said they came from the same owner.
-All the same back.
-All with an odd diamondish miscut where the bottom name is gone, and a huge border on the top. 
-On some, previous owner did pencil in names.
- Possibly from the top of the sheet - all lacking name on top with plenty of space.
- There is also a Carr out there that was purchased before I could pay, so there is an 8th in this collection (I can send you a scan if you desired).

$315 for all 7  - ppff - shipped
That’s pretty cool. Good luck with the sale.
